document.full_text: dan uggla hit a tie-breaking home run off roy halladay in the eighth inning to cap a productive afternoon, and host atlanta beat philadelphia to win twice in the three-game series.
document.title: roundup: against halladay, uggla halts slump and boosts braves
lines_and_colors: dan uggla hit a tie-breaking home run off roy halladay in the eighth inning to cap a productive afternoon, and host atlanta beat philadelphia to win twice in the three-game series.
